title: Enhancing Business Practical Competencies: Elementary Mathematics Teaching Competency Development Using Virtual Simulation Games

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can propose at least two instructional designs that promote students' problem-solving skills through simulation game-based math activities
Learners can collaborate with peer teachers by sharing instructional strategies and case studies via online learning communities (synchronous/asynchronous)
Learners can analyze educational dilemmas (e.g., role conflicts, achievement of learning objectives) arising during simulation game implementation and develop response plans

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
